text: Ara yakhana tadera kache ya ache allah‌ra kacha theke tara satyayanakari [1] kitaba asalo; athaca purbe tara era sahayye kapheradera birud'dhe bijaya prarthana karato, tarapara tara ya cinata yakhana ta tadera kache asala, takhana tara setara sathe kuphari karala [2]. Kaje'i kapheradera upara allah‌ra la’nata
